subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: African Story, a 7-year-old gelding, won the $10 million World Cup, the world’s richest horse race, by two and three-quarter lengths, making the trainer Saeed bin Suroor a six-time winner of the event in the United Arab Emirates.
snippet: African Story, a 7-year-old gelding, won the $10 million World Cup, the world’s richest horse race, by two and three-quarter lengths, making the trainer Saeed bin Suroor a six-time winner of the event in the United Arab Emirates.
